properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Calumet Harbor IL to Gary IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 2:55PM CST until February 14 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Small Craft
Advisory, which is in effect until 9 AM CST Friday.

* WINDS...Northwest winds to 30 kt.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 11 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 14 ft.

* ICE ACCUMULATIONS...Moderate to heavy.
properties.instruction:
A Heavy Freezing Spray Warning means heavy freezing spray is
expected to rapidly accumulate on vessels. These conditions can
be extremely hazardous to navigation. It is recommended that
mariners not trained to operate in these conditions or vessels
not properly equipped to do so...remain in port or avoid the
warning area.

A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
